General.Name: SK IE Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: SK IE Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacturing and selling of battery materials in South Korea, Asia, and Europe. The company operates through two segments: LiBS and New business division. It develops and provides separators for IT devices and EV batteries; manufactures film based and ceramic coated separators; and flexible cover window material for foldable displays. The company was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. SK IE Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of SK Innovation Co., Ltd.
